We can set timely access rule or some ip range to acccess the server or also can block some website or ip for a range of ip or forÂ  some limited time . #To block a particular Network: acl my_net … Continue reading Blocking IP,Domain,Time to Access Websites in Squid Proxy Server !

item.title: Ban domain access in squid proxy server
item.dc:creator: Fahad Ahammed
item.category: ban domain access in squid proxy server
bann domain access in squid proxy server
item.description: Some times we need to control internet users in public hotspot or wifi or also school-college-university network . Anyone can control domains accessed by squid proxy by this tutorial . First open squid proxy configuration : nano /etc/squid3/squid.conf Add below lines to that configuration anywhere and save it : acl blockeddomain url_regex '/etc/squid3/blocked.domains.acl' http_access deny … Continue reading Ban domain access in squid proxy server

item.title: Installing Squid Proxy Server in Ubuntu
item.dc:creator: Fahad Ahammed
item.category: ban domain access in squid proxy server
squid proxy server with user and password
item.description: Log in on Ubuntu Server, then type command below to Install squid : sudo apt-get install squid3 ccze Create directory for Cache, on this case cache directory placed on directory /home/precise/cache/. Then change the permissions cache directory to 777 and owner proxy:proxy sudo mkdir -p /home/precise/cache/ sudo chmod 777 /home/precise/cache/ sudo chown proxy:proxy /home/precise/cache/ Before … Continue reading Installing Squid Proxy Server in Ubuntu
